title: What is the best LoL external site or program for checking game stats?
body:
Some players can tell what your rank is when the game is running?

Some players can see what your individual game rank was after the game, the S, A, B ranking and so on?

What do they use to check all this stuff?

replies.body: theres also an app called lolwiz that shows everyones rank and builds during the loading screen which is convenient. lolking is pretty good too
The lol client should tell you at the end of your game what ranking you got for your game. Hover over your champion mastery points at the end of game lobby next game and it will let you know.
I know that, but how can you check for other players?
